sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-main>
      <NavbarComponent />
      <v-container fluid>
        <<router-view />>
      </v-container>
      <FooterComponent />
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import NavbarComponent from './components/Navbar.vue';
import FooterComponent from './components/FooterComponent.vue';
import HomeComponent from './components/HomeComponent.vue';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    NavbarComponent,
    FooterComponent,
    HomeComponent
  },
};
</script>

<style>
/* Optional: Adjust the padding if necessary to avoid overlap with the fixed navbar */
.v-main {
  padding-top: 64px; /* Adjust based on the height of your navbar */
}
</style>
